Do What You Want

Ten Very Different Projects in an Unusual Semester at Universität der Künste Berlin, Winter 2020.

Do What You Want is a recurring studio hosted by the Chair for Design and Building Planning.

  • Cashflow Workshop
  • Pantheismus in der Stadt
    Lotta Arndt
  • Terrapolis
    Maria Arnold & Jakob Köchert
  • Walking (the Ringbahn) as an Aesthetic Practice
    Chloé Borreguero
  • Cycles
    Felix Deiters
  • Blumenthal – 1Portrait

  • Zur Zerlegung von Atmosphären
    Yvan Leroy
